timeline.message:
Use annotations in errorprone
Motivation:
There are some useful annotations in errorprone.

Modifications:
- Use `@FormatMethod` with `@FormatString` and `@MustBeClosed` where applicable
- Replace `@CheckReturnValue` and `@GuardedBy` with the ones in errorprone
- Remove `@NotThreadSafe` that doesn't mean much

Result:
- More validations

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to annotate SafeCloseable with @MustBeClosed so that we do not have to for all SafeCloseable-returning methods?
timeline.author: trustin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -427,6 +430,7 @@ public static SafeCloseable withHttpHeader(CharSequence name, String value) {
      *
      * @see #withHttpHeaders(Consumer)
      */
+    @MustBeClosed

replies.bodyText: The target of @MustBeclosed is CONSTRUCTOR and METHOD so I guess it didn't work. 🤔
replies.author: minwoox
